name: CONTAIN!
text:
(This card is always treated as a "Rescue-ACE" card.)
If you control a "Rescue-ACE" monster: Target 1 Effect Monster your opponent controls; this turn, that Effect Monster cannot attack, its effects are negated, also if you control "Rescue-ACE Hydrant", it cannot be used as material for a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon.
